person.persName: James Jones, Sr. (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer and dressmaker)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer and dressmaker. Kentucky native. Married to Rhody Hammons in Fleming County, Kentucky, on November 12, 1819. Father of Thomas Jones, Jesse Jones, James Jones, and Lucy A. Jones. Farmer in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1850. Dressmaker in Bath County in 1860.
